mapper.select: select owner_no as ownerNo, owner_id as ownerId, owner_pw as ownerPw, owner_name as ownerName, owner_phone as ownerPhone, o_enroll_date as ownerEnrollDate, owner_level as ownerLevel from owner where owner_id=#{ownerId} and owner_pw=#{ownerPw}

select owner_no as ownerNo, owner_id as ownerId, owner_pw as ownerPw, owner_name as ownerName, owner_phone as ownerPhone, o_enroll_date as ownerEnrollDate, owner_level as ownerLevel, owner_status as ownerStatus from owner order by 1 DESC

select owner_no as ownerNo, owner_id as ownerId, owner_pw as ownerPw, owner_name as ownerName, owner_phone as ownerPhone, o_enroll_date as ownerEnrollDate, owner_level as ownerLevel, owner_status as ownerStatus from owner
